Index.title: Rate Professors & Schools in Costa Rica | EduRankCR
Index.description: Discover the best professors and educational institutions in Costa Rica. Share reviews, compare ratings, and make informed decisions with EduRankCR.

Login.title: Login | EduRankCR
Login.description: Sign in to EduRankCR to rate professors, review institutions, and explore education insights across Costa Rica. Your voice matters in shaping academic excellence.

Register.title: Register | EduRankCR
Register.description: Join EduRankCR to share your experiences, rate professors, and connect with the educational community in Costa Rica. Sign up for free today!

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot Password | EduRankCR
ForgotPassword.description: Reset your password for EduRankCR. Enter your email to receive a password reset link and regain access to your account.

ForgotPasswordSent.title: Forgot Password Sent | EduRankCR
ForgotPasswordSent.description: Check your email for a password reset link to regain access to your EduRankCR account. Follow the instructions to reset your password.

ResetPassword.title: Reset Password | EduRankCR
ResetPassword.description: Create a new password for your EduRankCR account. Follow the instructions to securely reset your password and regain access.

VerifyEmail.title: Verify Email | EduRankCR
VerifyEmail.description: Verify your email address for EduRankCR. Click the link in your email to confirm your account and start sharing your educational experiences.

VerifyEmailRequest.title: Verify Email Request | EduRankCR
VerifyEmailRequest.description: Request a new verification email for your EduRankCR account. Enter your email to receive a link and confirm your account.

VerifyEmailSent.title: Verify Email Sent | EduRankCR
VerifyEmailSent.description: Check your email for a verification link to confirm your EduRankCR account. Follow the instructions to complete the verification process.

VerifyEmailChange.title: Verify Email Change | EduRankCR
VerifyEmailChange.description: Change your email address for EduRankCR. Verify the new email to update your account information and continue sharing your experiences.

Settings.title: Settings | EduRankCR
Settings.description: Manage your account settings on EduRankCR. Update your profile, change your password, and customize your preferences.

SettingsSecurity.title: Security Settings | EduRankCR
SettingsSecurity.description: Enhance your account security on EduRankCR. Update your password, enable two-factor authentication, and manage your security settings.

Institute.title: {name} | EduRankCR
Institute.description: Explore {name} on EduRankCR. Read reviews, compare ratings, and discover the best educational institutions in Costa Rica.
Institute.generic_description: Discover the best educational institutions in Costa Rica. Read reviews, compare ratings, and make informed decisions with EduRankCR.
Institute.add_review_description: Share your experience and rate {name} on EduRankCR. Help others make informed decisions about their education.
Institute.add_review_generic_description: Share your experience and rate an institution on EduRankCR. Help others make informed decisions about their education.

Avatar.title: Avatar
Avatar.description: Please upload a clear and recent photo of yourself. This will help other users recognize you.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Please enter your legal name as it appears on your official documents.

UserName.title: Username
UserName.description: Please choose a unique username that will be visible to other users.

BirthDate.title: Date of Birth
BirthDate.description: This information is required for account verification and security purposes.

Biography.title: Biography
Biography.description: This will help other users get to know you better.

Email.title: Email Address
Email.description: This will be used for account verification and password recovery.

Password.title: Change Password
Password.description: This will be used to log in to your account. Please choose a strong password.

Errors.fetch_data: An error occurred while fetching data. Please try again later.
Errors.fetch_server: This error is on our end — we're sorry for the inconvenience. It's been reported, and we're working to fix it as quickly as possible.
Errors.send_email: An error occurred while sending the email. Please try again later.
Errors.user_not_found: We couldn’t find an account matching the information you provided. Please check your details and try again.
Errors.user_email_not_confirmed: Your email address hasn’t been verified yet. Please check your inbox or spam folder and verify it to proceed. If you haven't received or expired, please <link>request a new verification email</link>.
Errors.user_invalid_credentials: The email address or password you entered is incorrect. Please check your details and try again.
Errors.user_email_current_in_use: Seriously? This email address is already in use. Please use a different one.
Errors.user_email_taken: Email already taken. Please use a different email address or log in.
Errors.user_username_taken: Username already taken. Please choose a different username.
Errors.user_email_already_confirmed: This email address has already been verified. You can go ahead and log in.
Errors.user_not_confirmed: Your account is not confirmed. Please check your email inbox or spam folder and verify it to proceed.
Errors.user_same_username: This is your current username. Please choose a different one.
Errors.user_email_verification_already_sent: A verification email has already been sent to this address. Please check your inbox or spam folder.
Errors.user_email_duplicate: This email address is already associated with another account. Please use a different email address.
Errors.user_current_password_incorrect: The current password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
Errors.token_expired: The verification key has expired. Please <link>request a new one</link>.
Errors.token_already_used: The verification key has already been used. Please <link>request a new one</link>.
Errors.token_not_found: We couldn't find the verification key. Maybe it was already used or expired. Please request a new one.
Errors.token_invalid: It's very strange, and also a bit suspicious, but your verification key is invalid. If you think this is a mistake, please contact support.
Errors.token_already_exists: A valid link has already been sent. Please check your inbox before requesting another, or try again in 30 minutes.
Errors.login_required: You need to log in to access this feature.
Errors.review_already_exists: You have already submitted a review for this institution. You can only submit one review per institution.

Security.title: Security Settings
Security.description: Manage your account security settings. Update your password, enable two-factor authentication, and review your recent activity.

Register.title: Sign up today it's free for everyone

ForgotPassword.title: Request a password reset
ForgotPassword.paragraph: If you forgot your password, please enter your email address below to request a password reset link.

ForgotPasswordSent.title: Yeey! A password reset email has been sent to your inbox
ForgotPasswordSent.paragraph: Please check your inbox for a password reset link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

ResetPassword.title: Reset your password
ResetPassword.password_change_success: Your password has been successfully changed. You can now log in with your new password.

VerifyEmail.title: Wait... we're verifying your email address
VerifyEmail.email_verified_success: Yeey! Your email address has been verified You can now log in to your account.
VerifyEmail.email_change_success: Your email address has been successfully changed. You can now log in with your new email address.

VerifyEmailRequest.title: Request a new verification email
VerifyEmailRequest.paragraph: If you haven't received a verification email or it has expired, please enter your email address below to request a new one.

VerifyEmailSent.title: Yeey! A verification email has been sent to your inbox
VerifyEmailSent.paragraph: Please check your email inbox for a confirmation link. If you don't see it, check your spam folder.

VerifyEmailChange.title: Wait... we're verifying your email address

Avatar.update_success: Your avatar has been successfully updated
Avatar.remove_success: Your avatar has been successfully removed

FullName.update_success: Your name has been successfully updated

UserName.update_success: Your username has been successfully updated

BirthDate.update_success: Your date of birth has been successfully updated

Biography.update_success: Your biography has been successfully updated

Email.update_success: Confirmation email has been sent to your new email address. Please check your inbox to confirm the change.
Email.email_change_cancelled: Email change has been cancelled. The previous email address is still active.

Password.update_success: Your password has been successfully updated

Review.advise: Be honest, respectful, and specific. Institutions can’t pay to change or remove reviews. Avoid offensive language and take a moment to proofread. View guidelines.
Review.submit_success: Your review has been successfully submitted. It will be reviewed by our team before being published.

Form.footer: By continuing to use EduRankCR, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy.
Form.footer_email: If you don’t see the email in your inbox, be sure to check your spam, promotions or junk folder. Please note that only one email can be sent every 30 minutes.
Form.footer_review: By submitting a rating, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Your review will be publicly visible and may be used for promotional purposes.

Results.empty_desc: Try searching for something else or check your spelling.
